summary: This is an email chain from July 27, 2019, discussing upcoming legal proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein. It mentions a pretrial conference scheduled for July 31, 2019, and a meeting between the prosecution and defense teams on August 2, 2019, where the defense has a proposal to present.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the upcoming pretrial conference and the subject of the legal proceedings discussed in the email.

events.title: Pretrial Conference in Epstein Case
events.description: A pretrial conference is scheduled for 11 a.m. in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

events.title: Prosecution-Defense Meeting
events.description: The prosecution team is meeting with Epstein's defense attorneys, who have a proposal to present.

keyFacts: A pretrial conference in the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for July 31, 2019, at 11 a.m.
A meeting between the prosecution and defense teams was planned for August 2, 2019.
Epstein's defense attorneys had a proposal to present at the August 2 meeting.
The correspondence is heavily redacted, with most sender/recipient information and names withheld as '(USANYS)'.
